‚ÑπÔ∏è *Format Information*

üìπ *Video:*
‚Ä¢ 2160p \(4K\) \- maximum quality
‚Ä¢ 1440p \(2K\) \- high quality
‚Ä¢ 1080p \(Full HD\) \- excellent quality
‚Ä¢ 720p \(HD\) \- good quality

üéµ *Audio:*
‚Ä¢ 320 kbps \- maximum quality

‚Ä¢ 128 kbps \- medium quality

üì± *Supported services:*

‚Ä¢ And many others \(via yt\-dlp\)

üí° *How to use:*
